name: bem-xjst
description: Declarative Template Engine for the browser and server

scripts.preversion: bash scripts/update-authors.sh && git add AUTHORS && git commit -m "update AUTHORS" || true
scripts.make: npm run make:bemhtml && npm run make:bemtree
scripts.test: npm run make && npm run test:lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run size
scripts.test:lint: jscs `ls lib/*.js lib/**/*.js test/*.js | grep -v bundle` && jshint `ls lib/*.js lib/**/*.js test/*.js | grep -v bundle`
scripts.size: npm run size:bemhtml && npm run size:bemtree
scripts.size:bemhtml: uglifyjs ./lib/bemhtml/bundle.js | gzip > ./bemhtml.gz && ls -ola ./bemhtml.gz | awk '{print "BEMHTML Bundle Size:", $4" B"}' && rm ./bemhtml.gz
scripts.size:bemtree: uglifyjs ./lib/bemtree/bundle.js | gzip > ./bemtree.gz && ls -ola ./bemtree.gz | awk '{print "BEMTREE Bundle Size:", $4" B"}' && rm ./bemtree.gz

author: Fedor Indutny <fedor@indutny.com>
